_comment: Input file for the NormCode Formalization Algorithm (Iteration 10)
_instructions: This provides the required ground concepts (file paths) for the formalization process
_note: File paths are plain strings - the paradigm handles reading/writing
_execution_note: The formalization plan reads .ncds and writes .ncd incrementally line-by-line

_ground_concepts_overview..ncds file: Source NCDS plan file to be formalized (input)
_ground_concepts_overview..ncd output path: Where to write the formalized .ncd file (output)

{.ncds file}._description: Path to the source .ncds file to formalize
{.ncds file}._note: This is the NCDS plan that will be converted to formal NCD

{.ncd output path}._description: Path where the formalized .ncd file will be written
{.ncd output path}._note: The plan writes incrementally, saving after each line for checkpointing
